1.content: Welcome to the World of Pokemon. Now let's get started by giving you some information. The Pokemon in this world all know human speech. So trainers and pokemon will understand each other. All humans are normal sized, while the pokemon can be either normal, giant, or tiny depending on where the story goes. Also, this world is all vore, so some pokemon will eat another pokemon or do something else to its victim depending on where the story goes. Okay, I guess that's it for now. So what are you?
1.title: The Adventure Begins

11.content: Are you a boy or a girl?
11.title: Human

111.content: Okay, you're a male trainer. You're walking in the woods minding you own business. You see a lot of different Pokemon both big and small. You enjoy your walk until you bumped into something. What was it?
111.title: Male

1112.content: While absentmindedly wandering around you bump into something large and warm. You look up in surprise and see that you've run into a wild pokemon. But which pokemon is it?
1112.title: A pokemon.

choices: Leaned into your hand, letting you pet it.
11121.content: You look at the pokemon you just bumped into and realized that it was an Arcanine. Seeing as the Arcanine hadn't attacked you, you looked at it quizzically and then reached out to pet it. The Arcanine then...
11121.title: Arcanine.

choices: out of curiosity you let it continue
111211.content: You were startled by the sudden bite, but what surprised you more was the bite releasing a few seconds later as the large dog-like Pokemon moved its mouth farther up your arm; its tongue wrapping around your limb and pulling it farther in. You stare at the Arcanine...
111211.title: Bit you

1112112.content:
You watched as your arm slowly disappeared into the Arcanine's mouth, your face blushing slightly at the feeling. Curiosity overtook you and you found yourself on your knees with both your arms in the dog's mouth, drool soaking your sleeves and warm breath in your face. It was the first hard swallow that snapped you out of your trace-like state, your arms suddenly pinned inside the Arcanine's tight throat and your face pressed against its muzzle.

What do you do now?
1112112.title: out of curiosity you let it continue

choices: realizing the danger, you start struggling
your mind is too hazy and you let yourself slip farther
11121122.content:
even as you watched your arms disappear into the throat, you didn't try to struggle, in fact this was oddly alluring. A slight whine came from the Pokemon as it pawed at your pants before using its claws to rid you of those articles of clothing, you shivered against the cold and cringed as the cold hit your aching arousal. The Arcanine panted lightly before swallowing again, bringing your head and shoulders into its mouth, its big tongue slathering you with drool as it tasted you, it let out a hum of satisfaction at your somewhat salty taste. The large dog lifted you up into a standing position as it gulped, pressing your face to the entrance of its throat.

Its large tongue wrapped around your waist as your midsection was pulled into its warm maw, the dog swallowed again, its throat rippling around head. A loud moan tore from your throat as its pesky tongue found its way around your erection and gave a slight tug. You squirmed in its jaws as it continued to torture you into euphoria, another sudden swallow left you practically screaming as shoulders joined your head in its throat and the warmth of the tongue uncurled itself and left you yearning.

The Arcanine tilted its head back and swallowed again, the pulsing throat responding by pulling you deeper inside. Your arms slid into a more open space, the stomach.
11121122.title: let it keep going

choices: you wake up to find yourself relatively out of harm
111211222.content:
Part of you is screaming to panic but truly, your mind is too hazy to realize the danger. Your hips involuntarily bucked against the tongue as the Arcanine began to slurp up your legs. A low, satisfied, almost purr-like growl came from the Arcanine as it swallowed once more, landing your arousal inside its pulsing throat and allowing the dog to shut its jaws gently around your squirming legs. Gravity took over the work as the warm, rippling throat slowly worked you deeper and deeper inside; a loud shuddering moan wracked your body as you finally gained release, your hips pressing against the walls that surrounded you.

Outside, the visible bulge you made seemed to slide painfully slow down the Arcanine's neck as its stomach slowly expanded, its midsection becoming taunt as you slid inside. The Arcanine licked its lips as your legs finally joined the rest of you in its throat. It took only a few more minutes for you to slide into waiting belly, you were forced into curled up position as the stomach closed in around you in a tight hug. Letting out a satisfied burp, the Arcanine flopped onto its back, its hind legs spread as its belly rest over its lower half.

You pressed and pushed against the walls as they squeezed you again with a loud groan.
111211222.title: your mind is too hazy and you let yourself slip...

1112112221.content:
Deep down in the back of your hazy, lust-filled mind you knew the Arcanine had you completely trapped inside its gut, and that loud groan signified without much doubt it's digestive system was starting to stir.. But you couldn't really struggle against it, lost in bliss as you were, you barely noticed the chamber getting warmer, the fleshy, slimy walls starting to churn and groan over you, pumping the fire dog's gastric juices into the chamber, tingling and itching at first, but soon graduating into a mild burning..

The Arcanine rurrs as it licks its lips, yawning and belching again as its belly became more active, fully intent on digesting its latest treat without delay, the big fire dog was a bit lusty as well as hungry it seemed, rumbling as it pawed over its gwuorrrgling gut, panting in an open-mouthed smile as you slowly melted away into the big canine's pudge and nutrients.

You barely felt yourself fading away as with that belch, you'd pass out from asphyxiation, the last feeling being bliss as you churned and glorped away into more of the Arcanine's warm, fluffy chub, giving one final sigh as you passed out, never to awaken again, but at the very least making one hungry fire dog happy with its meal.
1112112221.title: Arcanine chow

11122.content:
"Char..." It growls at you, standing so close that you can feel his hot breath on your face.
"Um... what do you want" You manage to say, slowly trying to back away.
"Char!" It repeats, louder this time. grabbing your arms in a crushing grip.

What does it do next?
11122.title: Charizard.

111221.content:
The Charizard opens his mouth wide, wide enough to fit a human in it.
"No... please!" You beg to charizard to no effect. Suddenly, Charizard lifts you off the ground almost effortlessly and shoves you face first into his mouth. The hot breath washes over you as the throat muscles begin shoving you down into the stomach. Your body flops into the stomach, acids washing over you in waves. You can feel yourself getting digested and you knew there was no hope for you anymore, letting yourself slip into unconsciousness as the charizard absorbs his meal.
111221.title: It's hungry for meat

111222.content:
Just as Charizard was about to swallow you whole, another larger Pokemon swoops in, knocking out the Charizard saving your life.

Which Pokemon was it?
111222.title: Some other Pokemon "saves" you

1112221.content:
Just as you where about to be swallowed by Charizard, a portal opened up in the sky and out popped Dialga, squishing Charizard under his foot.
"Oh wow, thanks Dialga!" You say graciously at the legendary Pokemon of time towering over you.
"Wait... who are you?" Dialga asks using his (insert legendary ex-machina powers)
"Wait a minute," You say "You mean you didn't mean to save me?"
"Uh, no... I don't even know you. But you know what, all this time travel makes me awfully hungry and you wouldn't make that much of a meal... no offense"
"None taken... wait, then what do you going to do?"
"Well, being the legendary Pokemon of time does have it's advantages" Dialga says as he begins to float up towards the time portal.
"3 minutes into the past I go then!"

3 Minutes Prior!

"Wait no stop!" You yell, when out of the sky a gigantic mouth swoops out of a portal, Dialga's mouth to be precise, and swallows Charizard and you whole.
Charizard is pressed up against your body as the two of you are digested in Dialga's stomach.
1112221.title: The legendary Dialga!

1112222.content:
That's right, A gigantic Lucario just came in and saved you from certain death, towering over you at 40 feet tall!
"Wait.. why did you save me?" You ask it as it grabs you in its paw which was larger than your whole body.
"Well" It begins, speaking to you over some sort of telepathy, "I felt it was unfair that Charizard gets the free meal today, he's always getting all the attention... freaking gen one'rs."
You can't believe what you're hearing, your would be saver thought of you as nothing more than a snack!
"Wait a minute!" You start to say, but Lucario lifts you over his gaping mouth and drops you in. You fall down past 4 foot glistening white teeth, past a house sized tongue, down through a throat the size of a tunnel, and finally plummeting into the enormous stomach. You hit the ground, killing you on impact. Your dead body digesting deep in Lucario's body.
1112222.title: It's a... giant Lucario?

You say "Thank you, I always wanted a pokemon." (long yawn) The Lucario looks at you concerned "You look tired." You say, "Yeah I couldn't in fear of weird pokemon and I have no pokemon minus you" Lucario thinks of a place to sleep it knew something. "Do you want to sleep inside me? I won't digest you. You will be safe while I'm around. Do you want to?

There is nothing on you but your skin. Lucario opened its mouth and you slowly step on its tongue. The taste buds tickles your feet. Now you slowly lie on your back, then Lucario gulps you down. You go pass the esophagus and land in the stomach, and he was right the acids not burning you. It's like being in a hot tub without the fatigue feeling you get for sitting in for too long. In it, the walls slowly massage your back and the heart beating can lull you to sleep. This was the best place to sleep. "How is it in there?" You get drowsy, you can only say, "It....is.....the......best......." You are now sleeping with the best pokemon, which is now your best friend what more can you get.
11131111.title: Yes

111312.content: The giant Lucario is angry at you. It reach out for you. Will you run away?
111312.title: A mean Lucario

1113122.content: You were frozen with fear, allowing the Lucario to easily capture you. You are trap within its paws as it takes you to its cave. At Lucario's cave, Lucario is thinking about what he should do with his victim. On one hand he can eat you, on the other hand he can have fun with you by putting you in his feet and then eat you. Where will you end up in?
1113122.title: Captured

choices: Yes, the stomach acids are not hurting you
11131221.content: Lucario toss you in his mouth. You try to escape, but his jaws close right in front of you. You were being pushed by Lucario's tongue toward the back of the throat. And before you know it, he swallows you. Down the throat you go until you land in his stomach. Will you survive?

111312211.content: As soon as you landed in his stomach, you began to feel a burning sensation where ever the acids touched you. soon your clothes dissolved off your body. In a matter of minutes, you lose consciousness as the rest of your body digests in the lucarios body.
111312211.title: No, you'll be digested

111312212.content:
With a slurping sound you are deposited into the stomach. There's not much there but a pool of acid and half digested food. You take a second to take in everything around you. Fleshy pink walls dripping with saliva surround you on all sides. You've never been swallowed, and you have to admit, this experience was a bit... arousing.

But suddenly, like a light going on in your brain, realization struck. You've been eaten, and if you touch that acid, you die, so you need to get out fast. Not much of an escape artist, you frantically punch and kick at the stomach walls, hopefully to make Lucario throw you up, but your attacks were absorbed by the squishy pink flesh. You are pushed backwards by the force of Lucario patting his stomach. Enjoying your struggles, he lets out a small murr, which you can hear all around you. You begin to panic more as the acids start to rise. You back up, not wanting to touch the acid. It rises up to your feet.

It hurts! It hurts.... It.... doesn't?

You open your eyes and look down. The acid is around your feet, and has dissolved your shoes but it hasn't affected you. It feels just like warm water. Are you immune or something? You relax a bit, now knowing that you aren't going to get hurt. Sitting down in the pool of acid, you lean against the pink muscle, and listen to everything around you. The churning and gurgling of the digesting food, the beating heart above you. You wonder whats going on outside.
111312212.title: Immune to acids.

Being close to a legendary pokemon is every trainer's dream. Just then, Lugia opened his mouth. You gazed inside the darkness that is Lugia's mouth. You feel both lucky and nervous. Lugia kept its mouth open, which you suddenly realized he wants you inside. You didn't know what to do, except that you were taking off your clothes. Your shirt, your shoes, your socks, and your pants, till all that's left is your underwear and your backpack. You place your backpack on top of your clothes. You turn to find that Lugia is still there with it's mouth still open. You got closer to the great beast that is Lugia. You climb into mouth and rest on its tongue face down. Lugia then close his mouth, while you closed your eyes. The tongue was moist and slushy, but you didn't care. As you drift off into sleep. Few hours later, you woke up to found yourself...

You figured the chewed up ones were for lugia and the ones swallowed whole are yours. You were starving so you dig into the berries. Several minutes later, you find yourself tired. You then hear Lugia yawning as well, and it was loud due to you inside his belly. You figured why not stay in Lugia's tummy for the night. And that's exactly what you plan to do. Lugia later looked into your backpack to find one pokeball. He opened it to reveal a yellow Pikachu. You then hear Lugia speaking to Pikachu in the pokemon language. He must be explaining to Pikachu about where I am. Just then a loud gulping sound occured. You looked up the esophagus at the top of the stomach, to discovered that your Pikachu is there. As Pikachu landed, he happily rushed to you and gave you a big hug. You then yawned telling you you're tired. Pikachu yawned as well, and began to snuggle up to you. You smiled, and began to cuddle up and began to sleep inside Lugia's tummy. You think to yourself, I do not want to leave this place, ever. The night was calm and soothing. Lugia slept on the beach, with you and your Pikachu inside him.

choices: Wait for the giant Zoroark to return
Leave the cave and try to follow him
1113311121.content:
The next morning, the chirping sound of a Chatot outside mimicks "Good morning! Good morning!", waking you up. Looking around, you suddenly notice you are not in the Zoroark's belly any more; you're on the cool surface of the cave floor. You weren't digested after all, which makes you feel really grateful.

Climbing up to your feet, you start to walk outside of the cave...

...and gasp! Right in front of you is a huge...YOU?

"Hey, who the heck are you?" you ask. "You can't possibly be me!"

Your supposed look-alike grins. "No, silly," he speaks. "It's me..."

Then suddenly, your double begins to distort in front of your eyes. There is a moment's pause, and then, you see what it really is. It's the giant Zoroark, having used its Illusion ability.

"Wow," you gawk. "That was pretty cool!"

"You like it?" the Zoroark grinned. "I usually like to fool people with that trick...it's hilarious to see their reaction."

"Well, you sure fooled me..." you start to say, when suddenly, a deep growl in your stomach echoes out.

The Zoroark smiles at you. "I guess you're hungry, huh? Don't worry; I'll get you something to eat."

He turns and walks into the distance. You watch him as he disappears into the distance.

What should you do at this point?

1113322212.content:
The Zorua's face stretched into a massive grin that was laced with mischief, the giant Pokemon obviously very happy that a human accidentally bumped into them on this fine day. Its expression made you worry for your safety so you struggled a bit to communicate that you didn't like being forcefully pinned under its paw, hoping it would let you go. Unfortunately the huge fox was having none of that and pressed the paw down harder, snickering at your futile efforts.

Suddenly, its head lowered even further until a black nose was sitting barely an inch away from your face. Hot air rushed over you as it sniffed your head and it released its foothold on you just a bit so it could smell your body. The Zorua gave a gentle hum of approval before it raised its head and continued staring at you with a devilish grin.

While the Zorua was happy, you weren't all that optimistic about the possible outcomes of this interaction. With a Pokemon large enough to let them do whatever they wanted while also holding such a smug expression made you think you were already done for.

It only sealed the deal when the Zorua parted its jaws and pressed a hot slimy tongue against you. The giant paw that was pinning you down suddenly eased off and gave you a chance to escape, however, the tongue proved too powerful and kept you pinned down in the paw's stead. In one sudden motion it wrapped around you and lifted you up and brought you into the trickster fox's mouth. It was a snug fit and your feet barely reached the back of its throat while pearly fangs sat to both your sides. A deep rumble echoed around you as it snickered again.

You stalk through the area, hunting for prey to fill your massive belly. At your size it takes vast quantities of food to fill you. As you hunt, your nostrils flare, the scent of a wounded Pokémon fills your nose. You begin your approach and do your best to remain silent.

As you come around a bend in the Forest game trail, you see a fairly large Seviper perparing to eat a smaller Pokémon. You smirk, the Seviper is no challenge to you, it’s small compared to your monolithic size. You rush forward and lash out with a flamethrower before snapping your jaws down on the snake. Before the Seviper can recover, it’s already a bluge in your belly. With one final gulp, the last of the snake Pokémon disappears into your massive form. You lick your lips before looking down and seeing a wounded spiky eared Pichu. She trembled under your gaze and cowered beneath you.

You scoop up the Spiky eared Pichu and bring her up to your face for a better look. She continues to tremble in fear and is too frightened to speak. She smells delicious but would hardly pass for a snack. Still food’s food, or is it?

1221122.content:
“Little one,” you begin as you hold the Spiky eared Pichu. “I’m going to continue gathering food, but I’m bringing you with me.” You state as you lick the electric type. Gently, you put her in your mouth and slide your tongue over her, holding the small form in place.

Sometime later and after consuming amass amount of food, you return to your cave. As you sit back, you slide the small electric type onto your claw and look her over. She seems to have relaxed a bit and look up with curious eyes. You place her on your belly and smile down at her. “What’s a small little thing doing all by yourself?” You ask.

“My family abandoned me cuz this.” She replies indicating her spiky ear. “They said it was a defect and I should be ashamed for looking this way.”

You wince slightly. “Sorry to hear that. So you’ve been surviving in a world with hungry predators alone? That’s impressive.” You add as you two stare at one another.

“Mister Charizard...” Pichu begins. You arch an eyebrow. “I don’t mean to sound rude or anything, but it’s cold.” She says while shivering.

You mentally facepalm. It was getting cold as night came. You pick up the Pichu and bring her up to your snout. “Here, it’ll be much warmer inside of me.” You say as you put Pichu in your massive jaws. Once she’s tucked in and clear of your teeth, you close your mouth sealing her in darkness.

“Thank you Mister Charizard.” She says before snuggling into your tongue.

You can feel your stomach has emptied and decide to get some rest. “Little one, would you like to sleep in my belly?” You ask, expecting to be Thundershocked instantly.

“You won’t digest me?” Pichu asks as she snuggles your tongue.

“Promise I won’t.” You reply softly. You feel the small electric type crawl along your tongue until she reaches your throat. “Ready? You ask.

“Ready.” She replies.

You tilt your head back and witha single swallow send the small electric type into your massive stomach. You feel her land with a very soft plop before you yawn. She snuggles against the flesh of your belly. After a moment, you hear the faint snoring of the electric type tucked away inside of you. You yawn again before closing your eyes and falling asleep.

The next morning...

You reach down, grabbing the human in your claw before shooting into the sky. He struggles in fear for a bit, making it difficult to focus. Without another thought, you toss him into your jaws and swallow. You had no intention of digesting him. No. You just needed him somewhere out of sight and out of mind as they say.

Due to the sheer size difference, you barely feel his small form as he lands in your stomach. After awhile of flying, you finally land at your cave. The fight earlier had taken a toll on you and you needed to rest. With a fatigued yawn, you decide to lay down and rest. As your eyes begin to drift close, you feel the occasional struggles of the human in your belly. "I'll let him out after some rest." You think to yourself before nodding off.

You cursed your luck. It was only the first day of your Pokemon journey. And in only a few hours, you regretted leaving Turfield. You had gotten your starter, had your first badge and made the mistake of exploring the Wild Area. Your starter had been eaten by that Gigantamax Toxtricity that you had unfortunately stumbled upon.

And now, you were in the depths of a Charizard's furnace of a stomach. It was incredibly hot, humid and sticky. There was not point in fighting, you were done for. All that was left was to wait until you were slowly and likely painfully digested.

It seemed like hours had passed and you were still unscathed from the Charizard's innards. You could hear the powerful heartbeat somewhere above and the steady breathing. By this point, you assumed the massive Fire type was sleeping.

"Guess there's no harm in trying to rest." You said to yourself as you laid back. It did not take long for you to become comfortable in the soft folds of the stomach and before long you were slumbering.

1223222222212.title: Yet more choices

12232222222121.content:
“Alright! We keep moving at this rate, and we’re going to be in Eterna City by tonight!”

You walk leisurely down the long path through the forest, your trainer, Kyle, riding along on your back. You were a macro Espeon-- meaning you had a very rare condition that made you five times your normal size. You stood at over 15 feet, towering over humans and many other Pokémon. Despite your huge stature and relentless carnivorous appetite, you were very friendly and gentle with humans. Admittedly, you have accidentally stepped on or sat on them a few times, but never doing any serious damage. In fact, you have never eaten a single human in your life, preferring to devour other Pokémon.

Your belly grumbles. It has been hours since you’d last eaten. Your stomach is huge, and digests your prey quickly, so your appetite is relentless. You stop in your tracks, giving your trainer a distressed look. You don’t have the vocal chords to talk to him, but you do have the power to communicate telepathically.

"I’m starving. Can we stop for a moment so I can hunt?" you ask telepathically.

“Seriously? You just had lunch a few hours ago! Can’t you wait?” he replied, exasperated.

"Well, I guess it can wait… but I am getting really really hungry, and you’re starting to look pretty tasty right about now..." you smirk.

“Alright, alright! If you’re going to play dirty like that, I guess we can stop for a bite to eat,” he relents, throwing up his hands. You giggle, padding gingerly into the bushes. Kyle pretends to be intimidated, but he knows you would never eat him. You were just messing with him.

You walk deeper into the forest, before finding a small clearing. You lay for a moment down so that Kyle could jump off your back. While your trainer sat on a tree stump to have his dinner, you run off into the woods, searching for a delicious little snack to eat.

How are you going to fill your empty stomach?
12232222222121.title: Siana, the very hungry espeon

122322222221212.content:
You trod towards one of the hiking trails through the forest, licking your lips at the thought of a meal. Hunting down and swallowing wild Pokémon was fun, but it could get a little dull eating the same kinds of Pokémon everyday. Thus, you preferred battling trainers and devouring their Pokémon, because you could never be sure what you were going to get! You hoped they had something tasty.

You reach one of the trails, and immediately see a scrawny-looking trainer walking the dirt road. He looks quite timid, and was apparently foolish enough to travel alone. Perfect!

You emerge from the forest onto the path in front of the trainer, flashing him the most menacing look you can muster. He immediately panicked, as you expected he would. He’d probably never seen a macro Pokémon before. He immediately grabs a Pokeball from his bag, and tosses it onto the ground in front of him, revealing in a flash of light… a Lucario! You almost jumped with glee. Lucarios are a delicacy.

“G-go! Lucario!” the trainer shouted. The Lucario was stunned for a moment, before hesitantly assuming a battle stance. You smirked, deciding you were going to let the poor thing get at least one punch in.

“Lucario! U-use Aura Sphere!” the trainer commanded, and the Lucario immediately rolled up a ball of energy, before sending it flying through the air, shattering into your side. You flinched a little bit, but ultimately its attack did almost no damage.

Before it had a chance to react, you immediately countered with Quick Attack. Due to your size, this single attack sent the much smaller Lucario flying into a nearby tree. The Lucario collapsed onto the ground, immediately defeated. The trainer looked terrified.

“Please don’t eat me!” The human screamed, before running desperately away back down the trail. You giggle, watching him leave. You then trod over to the Lucario, still lying near the tree, the breath knocked out of him. You look playfully down at him, and he looks defiantly up at you. He was completely at your mercy.

You lean down and started licking his chest and face, savoring his flavor. He tries to push your face away, but he doesn’t have the strength. Eventually, you move your barrage of licks down to his paws. With each lick, you slowly nudge his legs further and further into your maw. He looks down, and you make sure to taunt him with a good view of your gaping maw and your dark, tight throat. He panics a bit, trying to get away, but you’re much too strong.

He’s quickly in your mouth up to his waist, his paws almost touching the back of your mouth. You raise him up in the air by his legs, before tipping your head back, letting gravity assist your soft swallowing. His paws slowly slide down into your throat as his belly enters your mouth. You hardly have to do anything at this point-- you just had to sit back and enjoy your delicious little treat.

After a few more full minutes of this, he was laying on his back on your tongue, up to his waist in your throat. You give him a few moments to take one last look at the outside world before closing your mouth around him, sealing him in darkness. You sit there savouring his flavor for another solid minute before leaning your head back and swallowing relentlessly.

His entire body enters your throat, leaving a massive bulge. His arms are pinned to his sides as he slides slowly but surely down your tight throat. The bulge eventually disappears into your chest, and you purr a bit as you feel his body being deposited into your waiting stomach. Your stomach walls squeezed tightly against him as your belly kicked into action. He couldn’t move a muscle-- all he could do was sit inside of you and wait for your stomach to turn him into but more fat on your belly.

You laid down on your back, rubbing your gurgling belly as it gets to work on digesting its new occupant. ’He was even more delicious than I imagined!’ you thought to yourself. After a few minutes, the struggles slow to a stop, as the Lucario in your belly passes out out due to the lack of oxygen. You stand up, letting out a cute little burp.

’Well, that was filling,’ you thought, as you walked back into forest.
122322222221212.title: Having a Lucario for dinner

123111211.title: Keep going!

123111212.content:
"You know what... I think I've had enough." you mumble to yourself, getting cold shoulder at the last minute as you don't know what could be down there.
However, just as you turn to get out of here the opening to the cave slams shut revealing that the "cave" was actually a mouth! A mouth belonging to a male lucario!
The roof of the mouth pushed down on you, forcing your body to conform to the tightness of the mouth. Your whole body was drenched in saliva, his warm breath washing over you in waves. You curse your bad luck when his tongue suddenly shoves you back into his throat, the powerful muscles forcing you down the damp squishy tunnel until it deposits you into the stomach, barely large enough for you if you curl into a ball.
"Please... I don't want to be digested!" You yell at the lucario keeping you captive. The only response was a satisfied purr from the lucario, glad to have such an easy meal.
123111212.title: Screw this! Turn back before it's too late!

12312.content:
Okay, you're a female pichu!

One warm spring afternoon, you find yourself high in a cheri tree, having spent all morning climbing just to reach the sweet berries on the topmost branches. The round fruits are as big as you are, and you find a ripe and juicy one to sit down and munch on. Once your little belly has had its fill, you lean back against the trunk and contemplate napping as your body begins to process your lunch.

Just as you're starting to nod off, something unexpected happens!
12312.title: Female

123122.content:
You're jerked awake as the branches around you begin to sway back and forth violently, as if something is shaking the tree! You cling to the trunk for dear life, but several berries come loose during the assault, and a particularly large one slams you in the back, sending you tumbling out-of-control towards the forest floor.

As you see the hard ground rush up to meet you, you hope for something--anything--to stop your fall!
123122.title: The tree starts shaking!

1231222.content: You continue careening helplessly through the air, but just as you're bracing yourself for impact, you land on something surprisingly soft--not the cruel, unforgiving surface you were expecting. Eyes still shut tight, it takes you a few moments to look around, and you see that you have landed...
1231222.title: Something catches you.

12312221.content: You land safely one someone's hand. But who's is it? Or is it a hand at all?
12312221.title: ...in someone's hand.

123122211.content: Well which one? Hand or Claw?
123122211.title: Hand/Claw

choices: Friendly chuckle (it’s your Cyndaquil friend fully evolved)
1231222111.content:
You look up in fear as you see the biggest shiny Typhlosion you’ve ever seen. You swallow nervously as you sit on his palm, watching as dozens of berries fall into his ravenous maw. He munches down all the berries before turning his attention to you. You had been around large Pokémon before heck you used to have a best friend who was a Cyndaquil but that sometime ago.

“What have we here?” The Typhlosion asks as he looks you over. His piercing red eyes looks your tiny form over before he brings you closer to his snout. You whimper as he sniffs you, nearly sucking you into his nostrils. “You’re rather tiny for a Pichu.” He notes.

You whimper as you stare at the giant fire type, afraid of what he might do to you. He opens his cavernous mouth, his tongue slipping out and giving you a long lick. Your fear only worsens from this action. You hear him laughing in a...
1231222111.title: Hand

12312221112.content:
“You don’t remember me, do you?” He asks as he begins walking, carrying you on his palm.

You stare for a moment before a light bulb goes off. Your fear fades as you smile up to the big guy. “It’s been forever! You had me really scared there, Marc!” You exclaim before nuzzling his hand.

“Ah, come on, lighten up.” Marc replies as he licks you again.

You catch up for a bit while Typhlosion walks, carrying you to his cave. You felt at ease knowing this Typhlosion was your old friend from sometime ago. Marc was always massive compared to you but now the size difference was even bigger. As you two reach his cave, Marc brings you back to eye level. “Wanna play like old times?” He asks. You nod excitedly. “Alright what game should we play?”
12312221112.title: Been awhile

choices: During the night you are swallowed
Next morning, still in the mouth
123122211121.content:
You cheerfully point at his mouth. “How about spelunking? The cavern has to be much larger with more to explore than before.” You say energetically.

Marc laughs as he brings his hand to his massive mouth and opens wide. “Good luck little explorer.” He says as you leap onto his tongue. You giggle as you feel his tongue lick you slightly. You run along his mouth, exploring every area to your old friend’s jaws. All around you, you hear Typhlosion purr in delight as you move around his spaceous mouth. Soon you flop back onto his tongue and gaze out of his mouth, the view putting things into perspective as you realized just how big your friend was. “Hey, tired already?” He asks as you laying on the tongue.

“It’s been a long day.” You yawn as you start to crawl to the front of his mouth.

“Wanna sleep in there? You’ll be safe from other predators.” He suggests.

You paused and looked around. There was plenty of room, you could easily sleep on his big squishy tongue. Plus he was right, you would be safe inside his mouth. You yawned and curled up on Typhlosion’s tongue. “Night Marc.” You way before falling asleep.

“Good night.” He replies before carefully closing his mouth.
123122211121.title: Spelunking (into Typhlosion’s mouth)

choices: Next morning, still in the belly
1231222111211.content:
You roll over in your sleep, still laying on Marc’s tongue. Typhlosion purrs slightly as he feels you roll over. He looks out his cave for awhile, enjoying the feeling of you in his mouth. He smiles slightly, opening his mouth for a moment, wanting to make sure you’re asleep. You continue to sleep soundly on his tongue. Marc grins ever so slightly before closing his mouth carefully again. He sits back, slowly tilting his head back and letting you slide down his throat. You land with a wet plop in Typhlosion’s stomach, unconsciously nuzzling the fleshy wall.

Marc yawns above you before falling asleep himself.
After a few hours you slowly open your eyes and look around frantically. It’s pitch black, your eyes taking a moment to adjust. Above you, you hear loud thumping. You whimper slightly before feeling something shift. “Hey, don’t worry. You’re safe, I won’t hurt you. Just get some sleep.” Marc reassures before gently rubbing his belly. You nod slightly and curl back up in his stomach. It’s warm and humid, but very comfortable. You nuzzle the flesh again enjoying the warmth and protection.
1231222111211.title: During the night you are swallowed

choices: He's not going to harm you
1231222112.content:
You land face down, eyes clenched on someone's claw.

"Are you alright?" A deep dragon-like voice asks a hint of concern in it's voice.

You slowly open your eyes and push yourself up slightly. You look around and quickly realize you're on the claw of a Charizard. A squeak of fear escapes you as you look up at the Charizard's face. You can tell that this Charizard is male and he is clearly in complete control of the situation. "Oh please Mister! Please don't eat me!" you whimper as you try to beg for you life.

The Charizard cracks a grin. You're uncertain of his intentions as he looks at you.

The grin and look in his eyes suggest...
1231222112.title: Safety in the Claw

12312221121.content:
You whimper as he runs his tongue along your body. The Charizard then nuzzles you before setting you on his snout, his eyes checking you over. "Don't worry tiny one, your safe." He says before going back to gathering food.

A sigh in relief escapes you as you sit on the snout. You knew you were a tiny Pichu but you were barely size of two of his scales. "Umm... Mister...?" You begin.

"Yes tiny one?" He responds.

"Can I go?" You ask, your voice shaking. The Charizard comes to a stop, his claws gently picking you up. You begin trembling under his gaze.

"Where is home for you?" He asks, his voice is gentle.

You point to a small patch of leaves under the tree. He nods and gently lowers you to where you pointed. "Be careful tiny one." He says as you leap off his claw. The Charizard goes about his way, leaving you alone, or so you thought.

No sooner had the Charizard left were you attacked. You whimper as a vine ensares you. A Victrebel eyes you before dangling you above its waiting mouth. You scream as you struggle.
12312221121.title: Gentle Charizard

choices: No interruptions on route to Charizard's cave
One or both of you fall into Charizard's throat
123122211212.content:
"Sis!" your Riolu brother calls as he rushes from your home. He punches the Victrebel with Power Up Punch, but due to being micro like you, it does nothing. He's quickly ensnared and brought over the mouth. The vines holding both of you loosen as you fall towards the mouth.

Suddenly the Victrebel screams in pain as a fireball engulfs it. You and Riolu are caught in a familiar orange claw. Both of you watch as the Charizard devours the grass type. Once he's done with Victrebel, his eyes look to you and Riolu.

"Thank you, Mister Charizard." You whimper.

"Wait, you know him?" Riolu asks as he looks from you to the Fire type.

"Are you both alright?" Charizard asks with genuine concern. You nod. He sighs in relief.

"Mister Charizard, can we live with you?" You ask.

"What?!" Riolu responds.

Charizard looks you both over. He nods slowly. "You may, if you so desire." He says. His wings uncurl as he gets ready to fly. "I'm heading back to my... our cave. For the time being, you'll ride inside my mouth. I'll let both of you out when we arrive." He says before putting you and your brother in his mouth. He makes certain both of you are clear of his teeth before closing his jaws. You feel things shift as he takes flight.
123122211212.title: Saved

12312221122.content:
“I wasn’t planning on eating you but you do look rather tasty.” Charizard’s deep voice rumbles. He brings you closer to his jaws and give you a long lick causing you to shudder. “M’hmm... just like the sweetness of berries.” He adds.

“Please Mister Charizard! Don’t eat me, I’ll do anything you want!” You beg as his rough tongue runs across your body again.

“Anything?” He questions as he gazed down at you.

“Yes anything!” You cry as he looks you over.

Charizard thinks for a moment.
12312221122.title: Mean Charizard

12312222.content:
Sitting up slightly, you blink down curiously at the soft ground beneath you, running a paw over it and taking note of the slick, wet surface and the unusual pink color. Still a bit confused, you finally look up, noticing that the ground seems to stretch on forever, like an endless road of pink. But as your eyes follow the road even farther, you see that the road is actually pinched off by a mouth; a mouth belonging to the chubby, pink face of a lickitung.

Which means that you were saved by its abnormally long tongue.

The pink and yellow pokemon blinks down at you with its beady, black eyes. At first, you're unsure of what it's thinking, but when you look around, you see that you're surrounded by cheri berries--and judging from the drool dribbling out of the corners of its mouth, to the hungry giant, you looked like nothing more than an extra furry fruit.

Seeing the greedy gleam in its eye, your next move was obvious: you had to get off! But just as you're about to make a mad scramble for the edge, the ground unexpectedly surges beneath you as the massive pokemon lifts its tongue upwards, tilting it sharply. Despite this, you still try to jump off, except that the lickitung decides to curl its tongue inwards like a bowl, forcing the berries (and you) to line up in a straight, single-file line. And as you begin to slip downwards, you realize exactly what the lickitung's doing: its creating a slide so that it can gulp down the berries one-by-one--and sure enough, you look down just in time to see the pokemon's mouth open wide, the black throat flexing open just as the first berry tumbles out of sight. The giant didn't even swallow. It just allowed the treats to fall straight down into its stomach, one after another.

In spite of all your efforts to escape, you soon realize that you're helpless to flee. The throat seems to rush closer--and that's when you see it! The uvula! Just dangling there high above the death pit that was the giant's esophogus. If you could just grab hold of it and hang on, maybe you could completely avoid your dark fate inside the pokemon's massive belly.

There were only a handful of cheris in front of you now, so you'd have to time it just right. You're inside the luckitung's beak now, and you countdown as you witness the last of the berries disappear over the edge of the tongue.

It was now or never!

You spring off of spongy surface, the glistening uvula in your sights. You reach out, and...
12312222.title: ...on a soft tongue.

123122221.content:
Your paws slip right off!

You let out a terrified squeak as you proceed to tumble down into darkness--exactly what you were trying to avoid. There are berries above and below you, and you occasionally bump the wet walls of the esophagus on your way down. After what feels like an eternity of terrified falling, you feel yourself enter a cavernous space and you land heavily on the mound of berries. Quickly scrambling to your feet, you try your best to hide as more of the treat drop down to join you. Once the last berry is deposited, the stomach entrance flexes shut, sealing you to your fate.

The muscled walls of the stomach immediately get to work, writhing and contracting as they begin grinding the berries against each other. And as if things couldn't get any worse, the same walls begin to exude a pungent liquid, thick strings of it dribbling from the ceiling onto the churning pile of food. One especially thick, green glob lands on the berry right next to you, and you witness in horror as the fruit melts right before your eyes, instantly reduced to a pulpy mush--similar to what you'll look like soon if you never get out of this death pit.

The fleshy sac you're trapped in continues to churn its contents. The air is thick with the smell of fruits and gastric juices as the acids continue to rise to overtake the mound. Despite your best efforts to stay far away from the digestive juices, you feel the ground beneath gradually become soft and squishy as the food you're standing on begins to settle. Soon, however, there's nothing left you can do, and your small body joins the digestive soup, the last thing you remember hearing being the intense gurgling of the intestines just beyond the stomach walls.

The lickitung leans back against the cheri tree, rubbing its full, round tummy in an effort to sooth its stomach as it broke down its lunch. Because lickitung lacked teeth for chewing, they made up for it with their extremely potent stomach acids. Thinking of the cheri berries, it began drooling again. That batch of berries had been especially filling--and its belly seemed happy too, finally shrinking down as the solid fruits were liquefied. Quite content, the pokemon shuts its eyes, listening to the quiet gurgles coming from its tummy.

It also thought it may have heard a tiny squeak, but by that time, the massive pokemon was already asleep.
123122221.title: ...you slip!

1232.content: So picky what'll it be?...
1232.title: Other

choices: The forest looks lovely, does it not?
12321.content:
So, you're a Mudkip. One of the gen three starter Pokemon standing at a measly 1 foot, 4 inches.
Where would you like to go first?
12321.title: Mudkip

123211.content:
Ah, one of the many rivers of the Hoenn region. This seems like a good place to start your story. Logically it makes sense, A water type in a river filled with tons of other water pokemon and teeming with life. However, nature is harsh to the small and weak, such as yourself, you're going to have to find some food and that could lead to some troubles. You decide to go find something to eat, as you can feel your stomach growling with hunger.

Where will you find a meal... or become one yourself?
123211.title: How about the river?

choices: A large predator ready to eat.
1232111.content: The river is filled with bountiful amounts of Magikarp and other water Pokemon, ripe for the picking and eating! You can see several fish swimming about, making your stomach growl. Suddenly the water ripples behind you and a Pokemon leaps out of the water... which one is it?
1232111.title: Somewhere up the river.

12321111.content: You turn around and watch in horror as a 21' Gyarados soared through the air aimed directly at you. You try your hardest to swim away but you're just to slow. Gyarados' mouth closed around your body. There seemed to be no escape as you get sucked into his throat and into the stomach. It was cramped, wet, and warm your body squirming uncomfortably, beginning to digest in his stomach. Your journey is over.
12321111.title: A large predator ready to eat.

12321112.content:
It's just a Magikarp, one that you gracefully catch in your mouth.
"Karp!" It pleads, but you know it's either eat or be eaten so you swallow the Magikarp whole, just barely fitting into your tiny stomach.

suddenly you start to glow, you're evolving!
12321112.title: Just a fish... eating time!

123211122.content:
You're not ready for evolution just yet, canceling your evolution with a press of the "b" button.
Suddenly, a wild Pokemon attacks!

Which one is it?
123211122.title: Press B!

123212.content:
The forest, flooding with life, mostly bug and grass types (Excellent choice wise guy...) Anyway, we start our story here, you're going to have to find something to eat soon, however this also means other Pokemon will be on the prowl for a tiny little Mudkip like yourself to eat.

So what happens?
123212.title: The forest looks lovely, does it not?

choices: You go straight to the stomach.
Maybe there's something he'd like in exchange for your life?
1232122.content:
You go around the forest in search of a meal when you hear a growl coming from a bush. Suddenly, a Torterra jumps out at you, trapping you under his feet.
"Wait stop!" You shout, hoping he could show you mercy
"Please, Do you think I'd let such a delicious Mudkip go for nothing? He says, opening his mouth and creating roots out of the ground to hold you.


What happens next?!
1232122.title: The 'predator' becomes the prey!

123231.content:
You are a male Eevee, born small within a family of other larger Eevees. You family was known to breed the largest Eevees in the forest and ruled this forest. Much to disappointment of your mother –a Vaporeon- and your father –a Leafeon-, when the litter was born, you were the smallest, beyond even the runt of the litter. Your mother and father were surprised you even survived the journey out of your mother’s womb without being squashed during her pregnancy by one of your brothers or sisters. Despite their disappointment in your size and your inability to speak or even communicate with you, being barely an inch at birth, both of your parents did their best to provide you special care. You mother allowed you have your own private feeding times, to avoid the hassle of fighting with your larger siblings over a teat to suck. Your father spent much time with you when he wasn’t hunting, even more so then your more independent siblings. The day finally came when your brothers and sisters were old enough to live on their own and leave the family cave, while you on the other hand had to stay with your mother and father, seemingly not ever having the advantages that ran in your family in the category of size.

Many months later, considering it would be good for you to see some of the outside world, your mother and father decided it would be best for you to spend some quality time with one of your siblings and would set off in the afternoon to find a brother or sister that would be obliged to taking you in for a time. While you wait for the sun to rise to its highest point, you think about your brothers and sisters, as well as your mother and father in a perspective as your three inch form lays upon your mother’s smooth and slick back as she floats in the pond near your home cave.

You mother is six feet in length from nose to tail, twice as tall as the average height of a Vaporeon. She is loving and caring like any mother would be, even towards something she originally thought as a disappointment when you were first conceived. She has grown attached to you, in the way the yearning to look after one’s child besets a mother whose other children have left the home. For this reason, your mother is ever protective of you and was almost against letting you go to live with one of your possibly mean brothers or sisters, but your father insisted. You spend half of the nights sleeping in the embrace of your mothers paws, while the other half is cuddling with your father.

You father is six foot three in length from nose to tail, slightly more than twice as tall as the average Leafeon. Though not as willing to admit it, your father is just as loving and caring as your mother, but tends to keep more of a distance from you I fear of hurting your accidentally. Though in a way, your father slightly despises you for your size, he loves you for the way you keep a constant bond between him and your mother. If it wasn’t for having to look after you, when your siblings left, they probably would have gone their separate ways. Occasionally, your father takes you on food gatherings with him, since he believes one day you will be able to fend for yourself, though this is but a dream of your fathers. Despite not being able to understand him or any other of your own kind, you have a feeling your father loves you very much.

Your first brother is an Eevee, who never came in contact with any stones in this unknown region. He is two foot two, above twice the size of a regular Eevee. Due to your brother being the second smallest in the litter when you’re other siblings evolved, you two were very close. Honestly, he liked being close to you because then he didn’t feel as small compared to the others. Often you would spend time crawling around on his belly when you two were alone and at one time you even helped him clean up his mouth, though this almost resulted in you becoming his next meal, but he was able to regurgitate you.

Your first sister is a Flareon that in five foot from nose to tail. Like your Eevee brother, she too cared for you deeply, but in a more sensual way. Often she’d try to take you someplace within her mouth and tried to swallow you whole. You weren’t able to talk to her because of your birth defect, unable to understand she just wanted you closer to her, to protect you. Since you didn’t understand too well why she did this, you were on a constant balance between loving her and fearing her, unable to choose between the two.

Your next brother is a Jolteon who is four foot six from nose to tail. By far the most rough out of your siblings, he was often the one playing fetch with you, literally; he tossed you up in the air and tried to grab you with his maw. This made some pretty close calls, but he was always smart enough to know the right position while catching you to not hurt you. Your brother was always energetic and excited towards you, something that scared you until you got use to it.

Your next sister, Espeon being four foot eleven from nose to tail, was the sister who cared very little for you. Often when tasked with looking after you during family outings, she would simply sit on you to make sure you didn’t go anywhere while she groomed herself. Despite your sister’s failings during most of the time in her presence, she would often use her psychic abilities to entertain you when she felt like it and when you were in danger; she would even shield you from being squashed or hurt. If you had to guess, she was just rough in a different sense from your Jolteon brother and that the way she treated you was just a way she showed affection. Perhaps with all the others coddling you, she decided to give you a break by treating you differently.

Your brother, Umbreon was five foot from nose to tail and often took you along on his night time excursions. You would often spend hours a night staring at the stars with him, nestled comfortably on his belly, listening to the noises it made and the heart beat not far above. One time or another, you imagined what it would be like to hear it on the inside, not knowing this was the same feeling your sister, Flareon wanted for you, but instead you felt for your brother Umbreon.

Your last sister and sibling, a Glaceon was four foot five from nose to tail and was very cold towards you. She would often attempt to bat you away if you got in her path and even stepped on you a few times, though never put on her full weight. A few times when you were eating your food, she would come and take it from you, even when you were still on top of it. This led to many encounters with her teeth and even a journey to her belly, only to be regurgitated as she left you lying in her vomit with disgust.

The afternoon finally arrived and you stood up on your mother’s back, she too getting the signal that you were ready to go, even though you two couldn’t communicate. Dreary eyed from relaxing so long, your mother carefully made her way out of the pond, making sure not to move too suddenly or you’d fall off. The sun reflecting off of your mother’s skin caused you to recoil and close your eyes from the intensive glare, your mother noticing this and quickly going into the shade. You father soon arrived with a Magikarp for tonight’s feast dangling from his mouth, held by its tail. Your father would often feed your mother before himself, so the Magikarp was for her. Dropping the fish Pokémon to aimlessly flop on the ground, your father prepared for your mother’s decision; who was going to take you to one of your siblings?
123231.title: Male

choices: Yes it did (Flareon eats you in happiness)
12323112221.content:
Your father lead you to where your sister lived and when both of you got their your sister came out. "Hello dad, I think I have an idea of how to make it so Eevee can talk and hear. " "really how so?" "Well I have this friend who is an Alakazam who is sort of is like a doctor and he knows how to fix these things up." Flareon had said, while you weren't able to hear you did develop the extraordinary ability to read lips. You nodded excited to be cured.

Later when you and your family were at the Alakazam's home he inspected you. "Hmm, this unique but I believe that I can fix this." His eyes flashed signifying he was now using his psychic abilities after a bit he stopped.

Did it work?
12323112221.title: Flareon has an idea

12323112222.content: How about your kind brother Umbreon?
12323112222.title: more please

123231122221.content: Your father stops at your brother's cave and calls out "Umbreon! You home?" "yea Dad I'm in," came the reply as a tall black figure steps out the cave. "Hey little bro!" He says smiling at you. You smile back in response. You dad says "I need you to watch him for a bit." "Sure, no problem," he replies. Your father says good and turns to walk away and your brother turns back to you who is now sitting on a rock next to him. "You hungry?" he asks. You...
123231122221.title: Umbreon

1232311222212.content: "Y-Y-Yes" you said and both your father and brother stop in their tracks. "Did you just..." your brother trails off. "Yes" you say again then your eyes shoot open "Dad, Umbreon, I'm talking!" "Quick! Go get Mom!" Umbreon says as your father bolts off to your house. He returns three minutes later with your mother and all your siblings. "Well?" your sister, Glaceon says. "Well what?" you reply and she passes out from pure shock. Then you audibly laugh. And your brother,even says "What's so funny?" "Your faces look hilarious!" you say and your siblings keep staring. Then
1232311222212.title: The mute talks

123231122222.content: This is the last sibling.
123231122222.title: more

1232311222221.content: These are the truly the last ones.
1232311222221.title: Ops. Okay, last siblings (for real this time).

info.brief_description: A Story on Pokemon Vore and more.
info.description:
This is about Pokemon in vore. I only allow soft vore in this story, so try to keep it clean. Digestion is allowed in some areas. If I find something disturbing, I'll delete it. Giant and tiny Pokemon is allowed. I will allow paw fetish as an addition, but try not to lead off the topic. I will try to add a couple of chapters of my own to help expand the story. Enjoy!

And Remember, when doing a chapter that's vore related, make it soft vore.
That means no Hard Vore, Unbirth, Soul Vore or anything like that. NO EXCEPTIONS!

Also, try to spell it correctly. If I find words that are misspelled, I'll fix it.

Have Fun.
